name: repAIR (TheGiorghoney)
description:
A pilot, a repairman and a damaged plane, what do they have in common? Well, the first two should cooperate in order to resist as much as possible aboard the plane!

  • As the repairman you need to repair the failures that will appear on the plane, trying to not fall off from it. Also keep an eye on toxic clouds!
  • As the pilot you need to maintain the plane stability.
  • As the plane... nothing, the plane apparently hates you.

[2 Players and 2 Controllers for PC required]
